import React, { useState } from 'react' import Button from 'react-bootstrap/Button' import Card from 'react-bootstrap/Card' const box = { width: '300px', height: '300px', background: 'blue' } export default function DeactivateBox() { const [deactivate, setDeactivate] = useState(true) var validate = true return ( <> Featured
) }
